name: ＡＥＳＴＨＥＴＩＣ Bone Hunt
description:
A side scrolling platformer game about a corgi who hunt bones. It can travel a mirrored world using special devices, allowing him to go further looking for bones.

Made for #CGAJam, #CorgiJam and #MirrorJam.

In the future, I'm gonna add more levels and polish the game. (add animations, transitions, particles, sounds/music. by the way, I'm looking for a musician ^^)

Commands:
Space or Gamepad "A": Jump
E or Gamepad "B": Activate teleporters
R or Gamepad "Back": Reset the level
